texts.orig: Exhibit 10.1
texts.text: Exhibit 10.1

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ENDORSEMENT AGREEMENT
texts.text: ENDORSEMENT AGREEMENT

texts.label: text
texts.orig: THIS ENDORSEMENT AGREEMENT (the "Agreement") is dated as of this ____day of ____________, 2012, but made effective as of February 20, 2012 ("Effective Date") between Healthcare Distribution Specialists LLC ("HDS"), a Delaware corporation, and Paul Silas ("Celebrity), an individual.
texts.text: THIS ENDORSEMENT AGREEMENT (the "Agreement") is dated as of this ____day of ____________, 2012, but made effective as of February 20, 2012 ("Effective Date") between Healthcare Distribution Specialists LLC ("HDS"), a Delaware corporation, and Paul Silas ("Celebrity), an individual.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: AGREEMENT
texts.text: AGREEMENT

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1. Engagement. HDS engages Celebrity and Celebrity hereby accepts the engagement to provide for his endorsement of HDS' product, Clotamin in the United States (Territory") as further outlined herein. In addition, it is understood and agreed that with respect to the Website, as defined below, the Territory shall be worldwide.
texts.text: 1. Engagement. HDS engages Celebrity and Celebrity hereby accepts the engagement to provide for his endorsement of HDS' product, Clotamin in the United States (Territory") as further outlined herein. In addition, it is understood and agreed that with respect to the Website, as defined below, the Territory shall be worldwide.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2. Term of Agreement. The term of this Agreement shall be for one (1) year commencing on the Effective Date and ending on February 19, 2013 ("Term").
texts.text: 2. Term of Agreement. The term of this Agreement shall be for one (1) year commencing on the Effective Date and ending on February 19, 2013 ("Term").

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. Grant. During the Term and subject to the limitations set forth in Paragraphs 9 and 10, HDS shall have the right to use the name, image, likeness, characterization, visual and audio representation of Celebrity ("Celebrity Attributes") in connection with HDS' product, Clotamin, in the Territory as follows:
texts.text: 3. Grant. During the Term and subject to the limitations set forth in Paragraphs 9 and 10, HDS shall have the right to use the name, image, likeness, characterization, visual and audio representation of Celebrity ("Celebrity Attributes") in connection with HDS' product, Clotamin, in the Territory as follows:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: A. In a television commercial (specific spot length to be mutually agreed upon) promoting Clotamin ("Commercial") aired specifically in the following three (3) television markets: (1) Washington, DC Metro Area; (2) Florida; and (3) Texas (collectively "Markets");
texts.text: A. In a television commercial (specific spot length to be mutually agreed upon) promoting Clotamin ("Commercial") aired specifically in the following three (3) television markets: (1) Washington, DC Metro Area; (2) Florida; and (3) Texas (collectively "Markets");

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: B. On HDS' website (www.clotamin.corn) ("Website"); and
texts.text: B. On HDS' website (www.clotamin.corn) ("Website"); and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: C. In Clotamin-related press releases.
texts.text: C. In Clotamin-related press releases.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: D. In connection with any HDS' usage of Celebrity Attributes as outlined above in Paragraphs 3(A)-(C), HDS will feature the following disclaimer in close proximity to said usage: "PAUL SILAS IS NOT A MEDICAL AUTHORITY. THESE STATEMENTS HAVE NOT BEEN EVALUATED BY THE FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION. THIS PRODUCT IS NOT INTENDED TO DIAGNOSE, TREAT, CURE OR PREVENT ANY DISEASE."
texts.text: D. In connection with any HDS' usage of Celebrity Attributes as outlined above in Paragraphs 3(A)-(C), HDS will feature the following disclaimer in close proximity to said usage: "PAUL SILAS IS NOT A MEDICAL AUTHORITY. THESE STATEMENTS HAVE NOT BEEN EVALUATED BY THE FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION. THIS PRODUCT IS NOT INTENDED TO DIAGNOSE, TREAT, CURE OR PREVENT ANY DISEASE."

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 4. Duties of Celebrity and Rights of HDS. During the Term and subject to the limitations set forth in Paragraphs 9 and 10, Celebrity agrees to provide HDS with the following:
texts.text: 4. Duties of Celebrity and Rights of HDS. During the Term and subject to the limitations set forth in Paragraphs 9 and 10, Celebrity agrees to provide HDS with the following:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: A. Upon request by HDS, one (1) production session to be used for the production of the Commercial ("Production Session"). The location, date and time of the Production Session shall be mutually agreed upon by Celebrity and HDS. In the event the Production Session exceeds eight (8) hours in duration HDS and Celebrity will negotiate in good faith additional compensation to Celebrity for time in excess of eight (8) hours.
texts.text: A. Upon request by HDS, one (1) production session to be used for the production of the Commercial ("Production Session"). The location, date and time of the Production Session shall be mutually agreed upon by Celebrity and HDS. In the event the Production Session exceeds eight (8) hours in duration HDS and Celebrity will negotiate in good faith additional compensation to Celebrity for time in excess of eight (8) hours.

texts.label: page_footer
texts.orig: Source: PHARMAGEN, INC., 8-K/A, 8/3/2012
texts.text: Source: PHARMAGEN, INC., 8-K/A, 8/3/2012

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: B. Celebrity will serve as a member of the Clotamin/HDS Board of Advisors, whose members' sole responsibility is to be listed as a Clotamin brand ambassador on the Website and/or Clotamin related press releases. With respect to the Board of Advisors, Celebrity will not be responsible for any additional services such as attending meetings, corporate functions, etc.
texts.text: B. Celebrity will serve as a member of the Clotamin/HDS Board of Advisors, whose members' sole responsibility is to be listed as a Clotamin brand ambassador on the Website and/or Clotamin related press releases. With respect to the Board of Advisors, Celebrity will not be responsible for any additional services such as attending meetings, corporate functions, etc.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: C. HDS may request an additional production session(s), or a media tour or personal appearance(s) for an additional fee to be mutually agreed upon by the parties.
texts.text: C. HDS may request an additional production session(s), or a media tour or personal appearance(s) for an additional fee to be mutually agreed upon by the parties.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 5. Consideration. As consideration for Celebrity's services under this Agreement, HDS agrees as follows:
texts.text: 5. Consideration. As consideration for Celebrity's services under this Agreement, HDS agrees as follows:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: A. In-kind Payment: HDS will provide Celebrity with a one (1) year complimentary supply (i.e., at least 365 caplets) of Clotamin product during the Term.
texts.text: A. In-kind Payment: HDS will provide Celebrity with a one (1) year complimentary supply (i.e., at least 365 caplets) of Clotamin product during the Term.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: B. Cash Payment:
texts.text: B. Cash Payment:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (1) HDS will provide payment of Fifty Thousand and NO/100 Dollars ($50,000) made payable to Celebrity's agent. CSE, as follows
texts.text: (1) HDS will provide payment of Fifty Thousand and NO/100 Dollars ($50,000) made payable to Celebrity's agent. CSE, as follows

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Within ten (10) days of the parties execution of this Agreement
texts.text: Within ten (10) days of the parties execution of this Agreement

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Within 60 days of the parties execution of this agreement
texts.text: Within 60 days of the parties execution of this agreement

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ten (10) days prior to the Production Session
texts.text: Ten (10) days prior to the Production Session

texts.label: text
texts.orig: [*Should Company decide not to conduct the Production Session, then the $25,000 allocated for said Production Session ("Production Fee") will not be owed to Celebrity and notice should be given to CSE as soon as reasonably known by Company if Company does not intend to conduct the Production Session. However, if Company schedules the Production Session, then said Production Fee is non-refundable regardless if the Production Session occurs. ]
texts.text: [*Should Company decide not to conduct the Production Session, then the $25,000 allocated for said Production Session ("Production Fee") will not be owed to Celebrity and notice should be given to CSE as soon as reasonably known by Company if Company does not intend to conduct the Production Session. However, if Company schedules the Production Session, then said Production Fee is non-refundable regardless if the Production Session occurs. ]

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (a) CSE, shall invoice HDS for these fees and HDS shall pay such invoice within ten (10) business days following receipt of the CSE invoice.
texts.text: (a) CSE, shall invoice HDS for these fees and HDS shall pay such invoice within ten (10) business days following receipt of the CSE invoice.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (b) Payments shall be made to CSE and delivered to 600 Galleria Parkway, Suite 1900, Atlanta, Georgia 30339.
texts.text: (b) Payments shall be made to CSE and delivered to 600 Galleria Parkway, Suite 1900, Atlanta, Georgia 30339.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (2) If HDS desires to add an additional market or state to the Markets for the Commercial to air during the Term, then HOS will pay Celebrity Five Thousand and NO/100 Dollars ($5,000) for said additional state/market, and the parties will amend the Agreement to add the additional state/market accordingly.
texts.text: (2) If HDS desires to add an additional market or state to the Markets for the Commercial to air during the Term, then HOS will pay Celebrity Five Thousand and NO/100 Dollars ($5,000) for said additional state/market, and the parties will amend the Agreement to add the additional state/market accordingly.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 6. Expenses. If applicable, HDS agrees to provide and pay for the expenses related to Celebrity's services provided in Paragraph 4, which shall include but not be limited to the following:
texts.text: 6. Expenses. If applicable, HDS agrees to provide and pay for the expenses related to Celebrity's services provided in Paragraph 4, which shall include but not be limited to the following:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: A. First-class airfare, first-class ground transportation, hotel accommodations, and meals for Celebrity; and
texts.text: A. First-class airfare, first-class ground transportation, hotel accommodations, and meals for Celebrity; and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: B. First-class airfare, ground transportation and hotel accommodations for one (1) representative.
texts.text: B. First-class airfare, ground transportation and hotel accommodations for one (1) representative.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 7. Union Dues and Fees. Company represents that the services hereunder shall not be subject to SAG, AFTRA or any other entertainment guild contract.
texts.text: 7. Union Dues and Fees. Company represents that the services hereunder shall not be subject to SAG, AFTRA or any other entertainment guild contract.

texts.label: page_footer
texts.orig: Source: PHARMAGEN, INC., 8-K/A, 8/3/2012
texts.text: Source: PHARMAGEN, INC., 8-K/A, 8/3/2012

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 8. Exclusivity. Celebrity represents and warrants that during the Term and in the Territory, Celebrity will not endorse or make any appearances or advertisements on behalf of any other multivitamin.
texts.text: 8. Exclusivity. Celebrity represents and warrants that during the Term and in the Territory, Celebrity will not endorse or make any appearances or advertisements on behalf of any other multivitamin.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 9. Review, Approval, and Ownership of Advertising. All HDS' uses of Celebrity Attributes in connection with the Commercial and/or press releases shall be subject to the prior written approval of Celebrity via his agent, CSE. Said written approval must be given within five (5) business days of CSE's receipt or said usage shall be deemed unapproved. Any such usage featuring Celebrity in the Commercial and/or press releases shall be and remain the property of HDS; however, HDS shall have the right to use said Commercial and/or press releases solely as outlined in Paragraph 3 and only during the Term. Celebrity may use said materials in whole or in part solely for the purpose of presenting Celebrity's work in Celebrity's personal portfolio, website or otherwise and/or on Celebrity's agent's website. Such usage may not be sold or transferred.
texts.text: 9. Review, Approval, and Ownership of Advertising. All HDS' uses of Celebrity Attributes in connection with the Commercial and/or press releases shall be subject to the prior written approval of Celebrity via his agent, CSE. Said written approval must be given within five (5) business days of CSE's receipt or said usage shall be deemed unapproved. Any such usage featuring Celebrity in the Commercial and/or press releases shall be and remain the property of HDS; however, HDS shall have the right to use said Commercial and/or press releases solely as outlined in Paragraph 3 and only during the Term. Celebrity may use said materials in whole or in part solely for the purpose of presenting Celebrity's work in Celebrity's personal portfolio, website or otherwise and/or on Celebrity's agent's website. Such usage may not be sold or transferred.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 10. Termination
texts.text: 10. Termination

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: A. HDS shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon ten (10) days prior written notice to Celebrity in the event Celebrity fails to perform the duties set forth in Paragraph 4 hereof or breaches any other covenant or agreement set forth herein and fails to cure same (if curable) within seven (7) days of receipt of written notice. Such termination shall relieve HDS of its obligation to provide any further consideration pursuant to this Agreement.
texts.text: A. HDS shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon ten (10) days prior written notice to Celebrity in the event Celebrity fails to perform the duties set forth in Paragraph 4 hereof or breaches any other covenant or agreement set forth herein and fails to cure same (if curable) within seven (7) days of receipt of written notice. Such termination shall relieve HDS of its obligation to provide any further consideration pursuant to this Agreement.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: B. Celebrity shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon ten (10) days prior written notice to HDS in the event of the occurrence of any of the following: (1) HDS adjudicates as insolvent or declares bankruptcy; or (2) HDS fails to provide consideration due pursuant to this Agreement, within ten (10) days following the date such consideration is due hereunder, provided that HDS is notified in writing of such non-payment by Celebrity and such payment by HDS is not made within three (3) days following such notification; or (3) HDS fails breaches any covenant or agreement set forth herein and fails to cure same (if curable) within seven (7) days of receipt of written notice. Furthermore, HDS agrees that such termination shall not relieve it of its obligation to provide consideration as contemplated hereunder. Celebrity shall not have waived any of its rights at law or in equity by exercising any provision of this paragraph.
texts.text: B. Celebrity shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon ten (10) days prior written notice to HDS in the event of the occurrence of any of the following: (1) HDS adjudicates as insolvent or declares bankruptcy; or (2) HDS fails to provide consideration due pursuant to this Agreement, within ten (10) days following the date such consideration is due hereunder, provided that HDS is notified in writing of such non-payment by Celebrity and such payment by HDS is not made within three (3) days following such notification; or (3) HDS fails breaches any covenant or agreement set forth herein and fails to cure same (if curable) within seven (7) days of receipt of written notice. Furthermore, HDS agrees that such termination shall not relieve it of its obligation to provide consideration as contemplated hereunder. Celebrity shall not have waived any of its rights at law or in equity by exercising any provision of this paragraph.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: C. HDS' rights to the use of Celebrity and Celebrity's Attributes as set forth in Paragraphs 3 and 4 shall end immediately should this Agreement be terminated pursuant to Paragraph 10(A) or Paragraph 10(B) above.
texts.text: C. HDS' rights to the use of Celebrity and Celebrity's Attributes as set forth in Paragraphs 3 and 4 shall end immediately should this Agreement be terminated pursuant to Paragraph 10(A) or Paragraph 10(B) above.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 10. Notices. All notices provided for herein shall be given in writing by hand delivery, courier service, or by certified mail return receipt requested to the addresses of the parties set forth as follows (unless change of address by notice to the other party is given as provided in this paragraph 10):
texts.text: 10. Notices. All notices provided for herein shall be given in writing by hand delivery, courier service, or by certified mail return receipt requested to the addresses of the parties set forth as follows (unless change of address by notice to the other party is given as provided in this paragraph 10):

texts.label: text
texts.orig: If to Celebrity: Paul Silas c/o Lonnie Cooper Chief Executive Officer CSE 600 Galleria Parkway, Suite 1900 Atlanta, GA 30339 with a copy to: Sue Graddy Fax No. (770) 226-5560
texts.text: If to Celebrity: Paul Silas c/o Lonnie Cooper Chief Executive Officer CSE 600 Galleria Parkway, Suite 1900 Atlanta, GA 30339 with a copy to: Sue Graddy Fax No. (770) 226-5560

texts.text: If to HDS Mackie A. Barch, Co-Founder Healthcare Distribution Specialists LLC 9337 Fraser Avenue Silver Spring, MD 20910

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 11. Licensing. Nothing contained herein shall be construed to convey to HDS any right to use the names, trademarks, service marks, symbols, logos, emblems colors, etc. ( " Marks " ), of the Charlotte Bobcats, NBA, or any other organization with which the Celebrity is or has been associated. All rights to the use of such Marks must be acquired from the appropriate rights holder, and if such Marks are used by HDS then, in such event HDS (a) shall provide Celebrity in advance with satisfactory evidence of HDS ' right to use such Marks and (b) agree to indemnify, protect and hold Celebrity harmless from and against any and all claims, damages and/or losses which may arise from HDS ' use of such Marks.
texts.text: 11. Licensing. Nothing contained herein shall be construed to convey to HDS any right to use the names, trademarks, service marks, symbols, logos, emblems colors, etc. ( " Marks " ), of the Charlotte Bobcats, NBA, or any other organization with which the Celebrity is or has been associated. All rights to the use of such Marks must be acquired from the appropriate rights holder, and if such Marks are used by HDS then, in such event HDS (a) shall provide Celebrity in advance with satisfactory evidence of HDS ' right to use such Marks and (b) agree to indemnify, protect and hold Celebrity harmless from and against any and all claims, damages and/or losses which may arise from HDS ' use of such Marks.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 12. Representations and Warranties of HDS. Celebrity relies upon HDS ' skill and judgment and also upon the following representations of HDS which shall be in effect throughout the term of this Agreement:
texts.text: 12. Representations and Warranties of HDS. Celebrity relies upon HDS ' skill and judgment and also upon the following representations of HDS which shall be in effect throughout the term of this Agreement:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: A. HDS ' products will be merchantable and fit for the purpose for which they are intended, and
texts.text: A. HDS ' products will be merchantable and fit for the purpose for which they are intended, and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: B. HDS ' products will conform at all times to all applicable federal, state and local laws, rules, regulations, ordinances, and other enactments and industry standards, including, but not limited to, those relating to product safety.
texts.text: B. HDS ' products will conform at all times to all applicable federal, state and local laws, rules, regulations, ordinances, and other enactments and industry standards, including, but not limited to, those relating to product safety.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 13. Indemnity. HDS shall be solely responsible for all liability arising out of production, distribution and sale of its product. HDS hereby agrees to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Celebrity, his agents, representatives and employees (referred to collectively as " Celebrity Indemnities " ) from and against any and all claims, actions, causes or action, damages, injuries, expenses, liabilities (joint and several), penalties fines, attorneys fees, court costs, and any other expenses incurred by Celebrity Indemnities arising out of (1) breach by HDS of any of the terms, representations or warranties made by HDS in this Agreement; or (2) HDS product liability or trademark patent or other proprietary right infringement; or (3) errors, omissions, fraudulent or negligent acts by HDS, its employees, agents or subcontractors in connection with (i) any advertising featuring Celebrity; (ii) with the performance of HDS ' duties and obligations under this Agreement; (iii) with the production, distribution, promotion, marketing and sales of products including related product packaging; and/or (iv) with the operation and management of its production and distribution facilities, however caused, HDS shall not be obligated to indemnify Celebrity with respect to damages which are the result of the active negligence or willful misconduct of Celebrity.
texts.text: 13. Indemnity. HDS shall be solely responsible for all liability arising out of production, distribution and sale of its product. HDS hereby agrees to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Celebrity, his agents, representatives and employees (referred to collectively as " Celebrity Indemnities " ) from and against any and all claims, actions, causes or action, damages, injuries, expenses, liabilities (joint and several), penalties fines, attorneys fees, court costs, and any other expenses incurred by Celebrity Indemnities arising out of (1) breach by HDS of any of the terms, representations or warranties made by HDS in this Agreement; or (2) HDS product liability or trademark patent or other proprietary right infringement; or (3) errors, omissions, fraudulent or negligent acts by HDS, its employees, agents or subcontractors in connection with (i) any advertising featuring Celebrity; (ii) with the performance of HDS ' duties and obligations under this Agreement; (iii) with the production, distribution, promotion, marketing and sales of products including related product packaging; and/or (iv) with the operation and management of its production and distribution facilities, however caused, HDS shall not be obligated to indemnify Celebrity with respect to damages which are the result of the active negligence or willful misconduct of Celebrity.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 14. Insurance. HDS agrees to provide and maintain at its own expense, the following insurance coverages:
texts.text: 14. Insurance. HDS agrees to provide and maintain at its own expense, the following insurance coverages:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: A. Commercial General Liability coverage of product liability with limits no less than $1,000,000 per occurrence and $2,000,000 aggregate.
texts.text: A. Commercial General Liability coverage of product liability with limits no less than $1,000,000 per occurrence and $2,000,000 aggregate.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: B. Umbrella / Excess Liability coverage inclusive of product liability with limits not less than $5,000,000 per occurrence and aggregate.
texts.text: B. Umbrella / Excess Liability coverage inclusive of product liability with limits not less than $5,000,000 per occurrence and aggregate.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: C. Media Liability insurance with limits not less than $2,000,000 per occurrence and aggregate.
texts.text: C. Media Liability insurance with limits not less than $2,000,000 per occurrence and aggregate.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The Celebrity shall be named as an additional insured on coverages A, B and C. Celebrity is afforded waiver of subrogation on coverages A, B and C. All policies listed under A, B and C should have a thirty (30) day notice of cancellation provision or endorsement. HDS will provide Celebrity ' s agent, CSE, with a certificate of insurance within five (5) days of its request for same.
texts.text: The Celebrity shall be named as an additional insured on coverages A, B and C. Celebrity is afforded waiver of subrogation on coverages A, B and C. All policies listed under A, B and C should have a thirty (30) day notice of cancellation provision or endorsement. HDS will provide Celebrity ' s agent, CSE, with a certificate of insurance within five (5) days of its request for same.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 15. Relationship of Parties. Nothing contained in this Agreement shall be deemed or construed to place the parties in the relationship of partners, joint venturers, principal-agents, or employer-employee, it being understood that the parties hereto are and will remain independent contractors in all respects and neither party shall have any right to obligate or bind the other in any manner whatsoever.
texts.text: 15. Relationship of Parties. Nothing contained in this Agreement shall be deemed or construed to place the parties in the relationship of partners, joint venturers, principal-agents, or employer-employee, it being understood that the parties hereto are and will remain independent contractors in all respects and neither party shall have any right to obligate or bind the other in any manner whatsoever.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 16. Assignment. Neither this Agreement nor any of the rights or obligations contained herein may be assigned or transferred by either party without the prior written consent of the other party.
texts.text: 16. Assignment. Neither this Agreement nor any of the rights or obligations contained herein may be assigned or transferred by either party without the prior written consent of the other party.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 17. Authority to Contract. Each of the parties hereto represents and warrants that it has full right and power to enter into this Agreement, to perform all obligations to be performed by it hereunder, and to grant all rights hereunder granted without violating the legal or equitable rights of any other person or entity, and that the execution and performance of this Agreement will not conflict with or result in a breach of or default under any of the terms or conditions of any agreement to which either party has agreed, or is a party, or may be bound.
texts.text: 17. Authority to Contract. Each of the parties hereto represents and warrants that it has full right and power to enter into this Agreement, to perform all obligations to be performed by it hereunder, and to grant all rights hereunder granted without violating the legal or equitable rights of any other person or entity, and that the execution and performance of this Agreement will not conflict with or result in a breach of or default under any of the terms or conditions of any agreement to which either party has agreed, or is a party, or may be bound.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 18. Construction of Agreement. Each party acknowledges that it has participated in the negotiation of this Agreement and that no provision of this Agreement shall be construed against or he interpreted to the disadvantage of any party hereto by any court or other governmental or judicial authority by reason of such party having or deemed to have structured, dictated or drafted such provision.
texts.text: 18. Construction of Agreement. Each party acknowledges that it has participated in the negotiation of this Agreement and that no provision of this Agreement shall be construed against or he interpreted to the disadvantage of any party hereto by any court or other governmental or judicial authority by reason of such party having or deemed to have structured, dictated or drafted such provision.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 19. Merger; Modification. This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement with respect to the subject matter contained herein and supersedes all previous communications and agreements between the parties pertaining to the subject matter hereof, whether written or oral. The terms of this Agreement may not be modified, waived, amended, discharged, terminated, or supplemented, or otherwise changed, except by a written document executed by an authorized representative of each party.
texts.text: 19. Merger; Modification. This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement with respect to the subject matter contained herein and supersedes all previous communications and agreements between the parties pertaining to the subject matter hereof, whether written or oral. The terms of this Agreement may not be modified, waived, amended, discharged, terminated, or supplemented, or otherwise changed, except by a written document executed by an authorized representative of each party.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 20. No Waiver. A waiver by either party of any of the terms or conditions of this Agreement in any instance shall not be deemed or construed to be a waiver of such term or condition for the future, or of any subsequent breach thereof, or any other term or condition of this Agreement. All remedies, rights, undertakings, obligations, and agreements contained in this Agreement shall be cumulative and none of them shall be in limitation of any other remedy, right, undertaking, obligation or agreement of either party.
texts.text: 20. No Waiver. A waiver by either party of any of the terms or conditions of this Agreement in any instance shall not be deemed or construed to be a waiver of such term or condition for the future, or of any subsequent breach thereof, or any other term or condition of this Agreement. All remedies, rights, undertakings, obligations, and agreements contained in this Agreement shall be cumulative and none of them shall be in limitation of any other remedy, right, undertaking, obligation or agreement of either party.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 21. Severability. If any provision of this Agreement, as applied to either party or to any circumstance, shall be adjudged by a court of competent jurisdiction to be void or unenforceable, whether at law or in equity, then such determination shall in no way affect any other provision of this Agreement, or the validity or enforceability of this Agreement.
texts.text: 21. Severability. If any provision of this Agreement, as applied to either party or to any circumstance, shall be adjudged by a court of competent jurisdiction to be void or unenforceable, whether at law or in equity, then such determination shall in no way affect any other provision of this Agreement, or the validity or enforceability of this Agreement.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 22. Forum. The parties agree that the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of Georgia, the Superior Court of Cobb County, the State Court of Cobb County, or any other forum in Cobb County shall have personal jurisdiction over the parties and that such courts shall be the exclusive venue with respect to any claims or disputes related to the Agreement.
texts.text: 22. Forum. The parties agree that the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of Georgia, the Superior Court of Cobb County, the State Court of Cobb County, or any other forum in Cobb County shall have personal jurisdiction over the parties and that such courts shall be the exclusive venue with respect to any claims or disputes related to the Agreement.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 23. Choice of Law. Regardless of the place of execution hereof, this Agreement, all amendments hereto, and any and all issues or controversies arising here from or related hereto, shall be governed by and construed exclusively in accordance with the laws and decisions of the State of Georgia.
texts.text: 23. Choice of Law. Regardless of the place of execution hereof, this Agreement, all amendments hereto, and any and all issues or controversies arising here from or related hereto, shall be governed by and construed exclusively in accordance with the laws and decisions of the State of Georgia.

texts.label: page_footer
texts.orig: Source: PHARMAGEN, INC., 8-K/A, 8/3/2012
texts.text: Source: PHARMAGEN, INC., 8-K/A, 8/3/2012

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 24. Attorneys' Fees. If any action is necessary to enforce the provisions of this Agreement, including any claims or demands, or to interpret this Agreement, the prevailing party shall be entitled to reasonable attorneys' fees, costs and necessary disbursements in addition to any other relief to which it may otherwise he entitled.
texts.text: 24. Attorneys' Fees. If any action is necessary to enforce the provisions of this Agreement, including any claims or demands, or to interpret this Agreement, the prevailing party shall be entitled to reasonable attorneys' fees, costs and necessary disbursements in addition to any other relief to which it may otherwise he entitled.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 25. Captions: Structure. Section headings used in this Agreement are for convenience of reference only and shall not in any way affect the interpretation of any section of this Agreement or of the Agreement itself.
texts.text: 25. Captions: Structure. Section headings used in this Agreement are for convenience of reference only and shall not in any way affect the interpretation of any section of this Agreement or of the Agreement itself.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 26. Time is of the Essence. Time is of the essence with respect to the performance of the duties and obligations hereunder.
texts.text: 26. Time is of the Essence. Time is of the essence with respect to the performance of the duties and obligations hereunder.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 27. Counterparts. This Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, each of which shall be deemed an original and all of which when taken together shall he construed as a single instrument. This Agreement may be executed by facsimile or other electronic transmissions, and signatures on any facsimile or electronic transmission copy hereof shall be deemed authorized original signatures.
texts.text: 27. Counterparts. This Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, each of which shall be deemed an original and all of which when taken together shall he construed as a single instrument. This Agreement may be executed by facsimile or other electronic transmissions, and signatures on any facsimile or electronic transmission copy hereof shall be deemed authorized original signatures.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 28. No Third Party Beneficiaries. This Agreement is not for the benefit of any third party and shall be deemed not to give any right or remedy to such third party, whether referred to herein or not.
texts.text: 28. No Third Party Beneficiaries. This Agreement is not for the benefit of any third party and shall be deemed not to give any right or remedy to such third party, whether referred to herein or not.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 29. Recitals. The recitals contained in this Agreement are true and correct and are incorporated herein by reference.
texts.text: 29. Recitals. The recitals contained in this Agreement are true and correct and are incorporated herein by reference.
